Assignment Description Our client is currently seeking an AI Architect The role will have an ongoing responsibility for overseeing the successful execution and continuous improvement of the AIML environment and governance structure Main Responsibilities AIML Architecture Overview You will perform an assessment of the existing AIML architecture covering data pipelines algorithms models and their scalability This involves identifying areas for improvement optimization and potential risks within the current systems as well as providing recommendations for enhancements Strategic Roadmap Development Your role involves proposing a roadmap to advance AIML capabilities outlining both shortterm and longterm goals You will also define milestones timelines and resource requirements to support the proposed roadmap AIML Operations Platform Review You will evaluate potential suppliers for AIML operations platforms based on criteria such as functionality scalability compatibility and cost By comparing and ranking suppliers according to the companyâs specific needs you will prepare a summary report of the analysis highlighting top contenders and offering recommendations Additionally you will develop a detailed requirement specification document to streamline procurement ensuring alignment with the strategic roadmap Governance Structure Development The role requires designing a governance structure that complies with the AI Act and other legal requirements This includes setting guidelines for AI ethics data privacy model transparency and risk management You will also provide recommendations for internal training communication and monitoring practices to ensure adherence to these governance standards Longterm Ownership and Management You will serve as the primary point of contact for AIML strategy platform management and governance Collaboration with internal teams and external partners is essential to align AIML strategies with the organizationâs objectives Additionally you will assist internal teams in evaluating the potential use of AIML solutions Required Qualifications Minimum 10 years of AIML experience including 5 years in senior consulting or management roles Track record of designing implementing and optimizing AIML architectures in medium to large enterprises Extensive experience in AIML strategic roadmaps setting milestones timelines and managing resources Handson experience in researching evaluating and selecting AIML operations platforms Expertise in developing AIML platform requirement specifications and managing procurement Prior experience in AI governance structure design and implementation Familiarity with AI Act legal requirements and industry best practices Strong communication collaboration and project management skills Proficient in monitoring evaluating and improving AIML environments and governance structures Bachelorâs or Masterâs degree in Computer Science AI Machine Learning Data Science or a related field It is meritorious if you have experience in defining business solutions fluency in English with additional language skills being a plus and a willingness to travel when required for specific tasks as well as the possibility to influence how AI and ML are managed within a large manufacturing company The desired attributes include a selfdriven attitude with the ability to navigate ambiguity the opportunity to actively contribute to defining architecture and processes and the ability to collaborate effectively with an international team

Assignment Description We are looking for 4 DevOps Engineers on behalf of our client These roles will involve the automation of infrastructure hardware platforms specifically focusing on server and network component orchestration Responsibilities include automating the installation and configuration processes as well as utilizing infrastructure automation tools like Ansible and Chef The position is primarily remote with 12 days onsite at the customers locations in Skovlunde or Brande biweekly You will be tasked with automating various elements of servers and auxiliary hardware components within the infrastructure platform This includes developing and maintaining automation scripts in PowerShell or Bash to streamline server and network orchestration Using tools such as Ansible the engineers will ensure efficient infrastructure and network component management Collaboration with development teams will be essential to guarantee the smooth automation of deployment processes Additionally they will document procedures produce 8221documentation as code8221 and develop training materials to support ongoing projects and team development Required Qualifications Extensive understanding of network and server hardware Proficiency in using automation tools like Ansible Python or Chef Experience with GitLab runners and container orchestration platforms such as Kubernetes Strong emphasis on ITOT security along with knowledge of security standards and products It is meritorious if you have experience with HPE Server Hardware Eaton Products and Meinberg Products Certification such as CKA Certified Kubernetes Administrator is also an advantage Familiarity with IT management frameworks including ITIL and tools like Jira will be beneficial for this role

Assignment Description On behalf of our client we are looking for a Project Manager to help further development of the existing web based administrator portal This project will require close collaboration between teams Requirements You should have experience in web based java development It is essential that you have the ability to make teams from different tech departments develop a common language You should have good people and communication skills as you will be assisting in the collaboration between two departments You need to have the ability to synchronize data between two backends as a part of master data management You should have experience working with the agile methodoly in a SaFE environment You should have good communication skills in English business level Communication skills in SwedishGerman are considered a plus nbsp You will be working from our clients office in Stockholm approximately 3 days per week

Assignment Description On behalf of our client we are now looking for a consultant with knowledge of Application Management amp Deployment and prior experience with Intune and Powershell Scripting Our client is looking for someone who can be a guide in how to best apply Intune as this is currently being implemented Role Description Perform package dispatcher tasks application setup documentation application testing mainly handled via AMO portal Perform mass application distributions and removals via the application deployment system SCCM Maintain packaged applications in related systems Client Software catalogue Active Directory Work with the ticket allocation system BMCRemedy Handle of VBS BAT PowerShell scripts used in CAM team Troubleshooting tasks around MSIAppV package related issues Create Reports and templates reports in SQL Power BI for CAM team tasks Maintenance of the âInformation toolâ used in SCCM Support Incidents Problem Management Critical Incidents etc Requirements You should have prior experience with SCCM Application Packaging You should have prior experience with Intune Application Packaging You should have experience with Powershell You should have experience with Scripts It is meritorious if you have a MD101MD102 or similar certificateeducation

The Role As a mechanical design engineer you contribute to constantly improve our product portfolio of bolting solutions tools core technology and mechanical development process You are part of research and technology innovation initiatives within the line organization and in the product projects ensuring that the client continue to be market leaderâThe solutions we develop are used to improve efficiency quality safety speed ergonomics and environmental performance You will collaborate closely within the organization to solve cross disciplinary problems keep developing our innovative core technology and ensure we make great products for our customer Responsibilities Design of components and mechanisms from concept to release to production Present and hold 3D model meetings with technical solutions Perform structural analysis hand calculation and FEA calculations Produce technical documentation for both internal and external use Investigate new solutions to improve sustainability performance or reliability Interface with engineering marketing sourcing manufacturing and testing teams Assist in design validation testing endurance performance drop

Assignment Description On behalf of our client we are looking for a Cloud Data Engineer Role Description You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the data pipelines in our clients Snowflake based data warehouse You will be responsible for loading and extracting data from source to target so that your team members of bi developers can utilize the data to create Power BI reports based on it Requirements You have 13 years of experience working with Snowflake hands on implementing SPs and UDFs You have 10 years of experience with Data Warehouse solutions prior to Snowflake You are an expert in SQL You are an expert in designing and developing ELTETL flows You have good communication skills and you are organized You are good at problemsolving and like to dig deeper into complicated matters You are familiar with Snowflake To be successful in this role you need to know how to check the metadata get and read SQL and JS based object definition or where it is used Fluency in Confluence You have practical knowledge of git You have advanced knowledge of Data Warehousing concepts and standard approaches You have advanced knowledge of Data Integration concepts streaming batch You have strong skills in translating business requirements to ETL solutions You are familiar with DataStage is an avenges but not a must You have knowledge about DS structures sequences jobs etc You have a large and extensive knowledge of how an ELTETL design and implementation should be designed to make it robust and scalable nbsp You will be working from our clients office in Poland either in Warsaw or Gdansk With the possibility of remote work after discussions with our client
